Articles.Content: ... is always on my freaking mind. Seriously, when I try to go to sleep, my mind is in the VAB, switching out parts and doing imaginary launches. Some other times when I'm in the shower, I hear the VAB music. It's driving me insane
Apparently you need to upgrade your brain to match KSP system requirements
You are not alone! Though I've turned the music off so I don't get that but yeah, this game has taken over a significant part of my brain.
That players think about the game , even while they're not playing it, means the developers did their jobs.
The Kerbals are invading I tell you!
It could be worse. You could have the Dwarf Fortress theme stuck in your head instead.
You need to turn Kerbal... for Science

Dont overplay it though. Its worth taking a weeks break every now and then. ( i say a week because i'm going to assume you will be playing it for a month straigh if your anything like me)

I'm currently on vacation from kerbal space command because I would wake up, accomplish nothing because getting my station to moho is aking aaaggggeeessss. So i'm taking a break and will be ready to play again monday.

When i first got ksp in 0.20 I played it non stop and quickly wore myself out and didnt play it for ages.
Have you tried swapping the Rockomax brain out for a Probodobodyne brain?
Give it another 3 days and the OP will be speaking reverse spanish like the rest of us
